138 {
139 int32_t DurationModifier = p_target->m_mechanicDurationPctMod[Spell::GetMechanic(proto)];
140 if (DurationModifier < -100)
141 DurationModifier = -100; // Can't reduce by more than 100%
142 setMaxDuration((getMaxDuration() * (100 + DurationModifier)) / 100);
143 }

158 }

177 m_casterGuid = caster->getGuid();

185 auto charges = getSpellInfo()->getProcCharges();

188
189 m_charges = static_cast<uint16_t>(charges);
190 m_originalCharges = m_charges;
191
192 m_updatingModifiers = true;
193
194 // Initialize aura effect variables
195 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
196 {
197 m_auraEffects[i].setAuraEffectType(SPELL_AURA_NONE);
198 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectDamage(0.0f);
199 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectBaseDamage(0);
200 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectFixedDamage(0);
201 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectMiscValue(0);
202 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectAmplitude(0);

204 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectPercentModifier(1.0f);
205 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectDamageStatic(false);
206 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectIndex(0);
207 m_auraEffects[i].setAura(nullptr);
208
209 // Initialize periodic timer
210 m_periodicTimer[i] = 0;
211 }
212
213 if (!IsPassive())
214 m_originalDuration = duration;
215
216 _calculateSpellPowerBonus();
217 _calculateAttackPowerBonus();
218 _calculateSpellHaste();
219 _calculateCritChance();
220
221 // Set duration after haste calculation
222 setMaxDuration(static_cast<int32_t>(m_originalDuration * m_spellHaste));
223 setTimeLeft(getMaxDuration());
224
225 // Call aura script hook
226 sScriptMgr.callScriptedAuraOnCreate(this);

◆ _calculateCritChance()

void Aura::_calculateCritChance ( )
private

Definition at line 751 of file SpellAura.cpp.

752{
753 if (!canPeriodicEffectCrit())
754 {
755 m_critChance = 0.0f;
756 return;
757 }
758
759 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
760 if (casterUnit == nullptr)
761 {
762 m_critChance = 0.0f;
763 return;
764 }
765
766 auto usesHealing = false;
767 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
768 {
769 if (getAuraEffect(i)->getAuraEffectType() == SPELL_AURA_NONE)
770 continue;
771
772 switch (getAuraEffect(i)->getAuraEffectType())
773 {
774 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL:
775 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL_PCT:
776 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEALTH_FUNNEL:
777 usesHealing = true;
778 break;
779 default:
780 break;
781 }
782
783 if (usesHealing)
784 break;
785 }
786
787 // Get snapshot of caster's current crit chance
788 if (usesHealing)
789 m_critChance = casterUnit->getCriticalChanceForHealSpell(nullptr, this, getOwner());
790 else
791 m_critChance = casterUnit->getCriticalChanceForDamageSpell(nullptr, this, getOwner());
792}

848{
849 if (getSpellInfo()->getAttributesExE() & ATTRIBUTESEXE_HASTE_AFFECTS_DURATION)
850 return true;

852#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
853 const auto caster = GetUnitCaster();
854 if (caster == nullptr)

862 }
863#endif

48{
49 if (effIndex >= MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS)
50 return;
51
52 if (auraEffect >= TOTAL_SPELL_AURAS)
53 {
54 sLogger.failure("Aura::addAuraEffect : Unknown aura effect type {} for spell id {}", auraEffect, getSpellId());
55 return;
56 }
57
58 if (m_auraEffects[effIndex].getAuraEffectType() != SPELL_AURA_NONE)
59 {
60 sLogger.failure("Aura::addAuraEffect : Tried to add effect to index {} but effect already exists", effIndex);
61 return;
62 }
63
64 m_auraEffects[effIndex].setAuraEffectType(auraEffect);
65 m_auraEffects[effIndex].setEffectDamage(reapplying ? damage * getStackCount() : damage);
66 m_auraEffects[effIndex].setEffectBaseDamage(damage);
67 m_auraEffects[effIndex].setEffectMiscValue(miscValue);
68 m_auraEffects[effIndex].setEffectPercentModifier(effectPctModifier);

77
78 if (!reapplying)

80 // Calculate effect amplitude

◆ canPeriodicEffectCrit()

bool Aura::canPeriodicEffectCrit ( )

Definition at line 281 of file SpellAura.cpp.

282{
283#if VERSION_STRING < WotLK
284 // Periodic effects never crit in Classic or TBC
285 return false;
286#elif VERSION_STRING == WotLK
287 const auto caster = GetUnitCaster();
288 if (caster == nullptr)
289 return false;
290
291 const auto spellInfo = getSpellInfo();
292
293 if (caster->isPlayer())
294 {
295 // Patch 3.3.3 - The damage-over-time component of Rupture can now produce critical strikes
296 if (spellInfo->getSpellFamilyName() == SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE && spellInfo->getSpellFamilyFlags(0) == 0x100000)
297 return true;
298 }
299
300 for (const auto& aurEff : caster->getAuraEffectList(SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_DOT_TO_CRIT))
301 {
302 if (aurEff->getAura()->getSpellInfo()->isAuraEffectAffectingSpell(SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_DOT_TO_CRIT, spellInfo))
303 return true;
304 }
305
306 return false;
307#else
308 ///\ todo: confirm can ALL periodic effects crit after cata
309 const auto caster = GetUnitCaster();
310 if (caster != nullptr && caster->isPlayer())
311 return true;
312
313 return false;
314#endif
315}
SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_DOT_TO_CRIT
@ SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_DOT_TO_CRIT
Definition AuraEffects.hpp:286

@ SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE

3363{
3364 if (!m_target->isAlive())
3365 return;
3366

3369 uint32_t mh = m_target->getMaxHealth();

◆ EventUpdateAreaAura()

void Aura::EventUpdateAreaAura ( uint8_t  effIndex,
float  r 
)

Definition at line 632 of file SpellAuras.Legacy.cpp.

633{
634 /* burlex: cheap hack to get this to execute in the correct context always */
635 if (event_GetCurrentInstanceId() == -1)
636 {
637 event_Relocate();
638 return;
639 }
640
641 Unit* u_caster = GetUnitCaster();
642
643 // if the caster is no longer valid->remove the aura
644 if (u_caster == nullptr)
645 {
646 removeAura();
647 //since we lost the caster we cannot do anything more
648 return;
649 }
650
651 // Do not update area aura if caster is not in world yet
652 if (!u_caster->IsInWorld())
653 return;
654
655 uint32_t AreaAuraEffectId = m_spellInfo->getAreaAuraEffect();
656
657 switch (AreaAuraEffectId)
658 {
659
660 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GROUP_AREA_AURA:
661 EventUpdateGroupAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
662 break;
663
664 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_RAID_AREA_AURA:
665 EventUpdateRaidAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
666 break;
667
668 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_PET_AREA_AURA:
669 EventUpdatePetAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
670 break;
671
672 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_FRIEND_AREA_AURA:
673 EventUpdateFriendAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
674 break;
675
676 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_ENEMY_AREA_AURA:
677 EventUpdateEnemyAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
678 break;
679
680#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
681 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_OWNER_AREA_AURA:
682 EventUpdateOwnerAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
683 break;
684#endif
685
686 default:
687 sLogger.failure("Spell {} ({}) has tried to update Area Aura targets but Spell has no valid Area Aura effect {}.", m_spellInfo->getId(), m_spellInfo->getName(), AreaAuraEffectId);
688 return;
689 }
690
691 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
692 {
693 auto unit = m_target->getWorldMap()->getUnit(*itr);
694 if (unit == nullptr)
695 return;
696
697 if (unit->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
698 continue;
699
700 auto a = sSpellMgr.newAura(m_spellInfo, getTimeLeft(), m_target, unit, true);
701 a->m_areaAura = true;
702 a->addAuraEffect(m_auraEffects[effIndex].getAuraEffectType(), m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectDamage(), m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectMiscValue(), m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectPercentModifier(), true, m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectIndex());
703 unit->addAura(std::move(a));
704 }
705}
SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GROUP_AREA_AURA
@ SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GROUP_AREA_AURA

534{
535 Unit* u = m_target;
536 if (u == nullptr)
537 return;

540 {
541 Object* o = itr;
542
543 if (!o || !o->isCreatureOrPlayer())
544 continue;
545
546 Unit* ou = static_cast<Unit*>(o);
547
548 if (u->getDistanceSq(ou) > r)
549 continue;
550
551 if ((u->GetPhase() & ou->GetPhase()) == 0)
552 continue;
553

555 continue;
556

558 continue;

◆ EventUpdateGroupAA()

void Aura::EventUpdateGroupAA ( AuraEffectModifier *  aurEff,

)

Definition at line 238 of file SpellAuras.Legacy.cpp.

239{
240 Player* owner = m_target->getPlayerOwnerOrSelf();
241 if (owner == nullptr)
242 {
243 targets.clear();
244 return;
245 }
246
247 if (!owner->isInGroup())
248 {
249 if (m_target->getGuid() != owner->getGuid())
250 {
251 if ((m_target->getDistanceSq(owner) <= r))
252 {
253 if (!owner->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
254 targets.insert(owner->getGuid());
255 }
256 else
257 {
258 if (owner->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
259 {
260 targets.erase(owner->getGuidLow());
261 owner->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
262 }
263 }
264 }
265 }
266 else
267 {
268 owner->getGroup()->Lock();
269
270 SubGroup* sg = owner->getGroup()->GetSubGroup(owner->getSubGroupSlot());
271 for (const auto cachedCharacterInfo : sg->getGroupMembers())
272 {
273 Player* op = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(cachedCharacterInfo->guid);
274
275 if (op == nullptr)
276 continue;
277
278 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(op) > r)
279 continue;
280
281 if (m_target->GetInstanceID() != op->GetInstanceID())
282 continue;
283
284 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & op->GetPhase()) == 0)
285 continue;
286
287 if (!op->isAlive())
288 continue;
289
290 if (op->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
291 continue;
292
293 targets.insert(op->getGuid());
294 }
295
296 owner->getGroup()->Unlock();
297 }
298
299 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end();)
300 {
301 AreaAuraList::iterator itr2 = itr;
302 ++itr;
303
304 Player* tp = m_target->getWorldMap()->getPlayer(WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(*itr2));
305
306 bool removable = false;
307 if (tp == nullptr)
308 {
309 targets.erase(itr2);
310 continue;
311 }
312
313 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(tp) > r)
314 removable = true;
315
316 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & tp->GetPhase()) == 0)
317 removable = true;
318
319 if ((tp->getGuid() != owner->getGuid()) && !tp->isInGroup())
320 removable = true;
321 else
322 {
323 if (owner->isInGroup())
324 {
325 if (owner->getGroup()->GetID() != tp->getGroup()->GetID())
326 removable = true;
327
328 if (owner->getSubGroupSlot() != tp->getSubGroupSlot())
329 removable = true;
330 }
331 }
332
333 if (removable)
334 {
335 targets.erase(itr2);
336 tp->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
337 }
338 }
339}

Definition at line 341 of file SpellAuras.Legacy.cpp.

342{
343 Player* owner = m_target->getPlayerOwnerOrSelf();
344 if (owner == nullptr)
345 {
346 targets.clear();
347 return;
348 }
349
350 if (!owner->isInGroup())
351 {
352 if (m_target->getGuid() != owner->getGuid())
353 {

355 {

357 targets.insert(owner->getGuid());
358 }
359 else

371 {

373
374 group->Lock();
375
376 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < group->GetSubGroupCount(); i++)
377 {
378 SubGroup* sg = group->GetSubGroup(i);
379

381 {
382 Player* op = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(cachedCharacterInfo->guid);
383
384 if (op == nullptr)
385 continue;
386
387 if (op->GetInstanceID() != m_target->GetInstanceID())
388 continue;
389
390 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(op) > r)
391 continue;
392
393 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & op->GetPhase()) == 0)
394 continue;
395
396 if (!op->isAlive())
397 continue;
398
399 if (op->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
400 continue;
401
402 targets.insert(op->getGuid());
403 }
404 }
405
406 group->Unlock();
407 }
408
409 // Check for targets that should be no longer affected
410 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end();)
411 {
412 AreaAuraList::iterator itr2 = itr;
413 ++itr;
414
415 Player* tp = m_target->getWorldMap()->getPlayer(WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(*itr2));
416 bool removable = false;
417
418 if (tp == nullptr)
419 {
420 targets.erase(itr2);
421 continue;
422 }
423
424 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(tp) > r)
425 removable = true;
426
427 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & tp->GetPhase()) == 0)
428 removable = true;
429
430 if ((tp->getGuid() != owner->getGuid()) && !tp->isInGroup())
431 removable = true;
432
433 if (removable)
434 {
435 targets.erase(itr2);
436 tp->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
437 }
438 }
439}

560 ///\ todo: these seem to be wrong for tbc

567 auraFlags |= 1 << i;
568 }

uint16_t Aura::getPeriodicTickCountForEffect ( uint8_t  effIndex) const

416{
417 if (m_auraEffects[effIndex].getAuraEffectType() == SPELL_AURA_NONE)
418 return 1;
419
420 if (m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectAmplitude() == 0 || getMaxDuration() == -1)
421 return 1;
422
423 // Never return 0 to avoid division by zero later
424 return std::max(static_cast<uint16_t>(1), static_cast<uint16_t>(getMaxDuration() / m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectAmplitude()));

◆ HandleAuraControlVehicle()

void Aura::HandleAuraControlVehicle ( AuraEffectModifier *  aurEff,
bool  apply 
)

Definition at line 5664 of file SpellAuras.Legacy.cpp.

5665{
5666#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
5667 if (!getCaster())
5668 return;
5669
5670 if (!getCaster()->isCreatureOrPlayer())
5671 return;
5672
5673 if (m_target->isCreature() && !m_target->isVehicle() || !m_target->getVehicleKit())
5674 return;
5675
5676 Unit* caster = static_cast<Unit*>(getCaster());
5677 auto seatId = static_cast<int8_t>(aurEff->getEffectBaseDamage() - 1);
5678
5679 if (apply)
5680 {
5681 caster->enterVehicle(m_target->getVehicleKit(), seatId);
5682 }
5683 else
5684 {
5685 if (getSpellId() == 53111) // Devour Humanoid
5686 {
5687 if (caster->getObjectTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
5688 caster->ToCreature()->Despawn(0, 0);
5689 }
5690
5691 if (seatId == m_target->getVehicleKit()->getSeatForNumberPassenger(caster))
5692 caster->exitVehicle();
5693 else if (seatId >= 0)
5694 m_target->getVehicleKit()->removePassenger(caster);
5695 else
5696 caster->exitVehicle();
5697
5698 // some SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE auras have a dummy effect on the player - remove them
5699 caster->removeAllAurasById(getSpellId());
5700 }
5701#endif
5702}

◆ periodicTick()

void Aura::periodicTick ( AuraEffectModifier *  aurEff)
private

\ todo: verify this

Definition at line 868 of file SpellAura.cpp.

869{
870 auto effectFloatValue = aurEff->getEffectFloatDamage();
871 const auto scriptResult = sScriptMgr.callScriptedAuraOnPeriodicTick(this, aurEff, &effectFloatValue);
872 // If script prevents default action, do not continue
873 if (scriptResult == SpellScriptExecuteState::EXECUTE_PREVENT)
874 return;
875
876 int32_t customDamage = 0;
877 auto effectIntValue = static_cast<int32_t>(std::ceil(effectFloatValue));
878
879 switch (aurEff->getAuraEffectType())
880 {
881 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE:
882 {
883 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
884
885 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
886 casterUnit->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
887 else
888 getOwner()->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
889 } break;
890 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL:
891 {
892 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
893
894 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
895 casterUnit->doSpellHealing(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
896 else
897 getOwner()->doSpellHealing(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
898
899 // Hackfixes from legacy method
900 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
901 {
902 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
903 {
904 switch (getSpellInfo()->getId())
905 {
906 //SPELL_HASH_HEALTH_FUNNEL
907 case 755:
908 case 3698:
909 case 3699:
910 case 3700:
911 case 11693:
912 case 11694:
913 case 11695:
914 case 16569:
915 case 27259:
916 case 40671:
917 case 46467:
918 case 47856:
919 case 60829:
920 {
921 DamageInfo sdmg;
922
923 sdmg.fullDamage = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
924 sdmg.resistedDamage = 0;
925 sdmg.schoolMask = SchoolMask(getSpellInfo()->getSchoolMask());
926 casterUnit->dealDamage(casterUnit, static_cast<uint32_t>(aurEff->getEffectDamage()), 0);
927 casterUnit->sendAttackerStateUpdate(casterUnit->GetNewGUID(), casterUnit->GetNewGUID(), HITSTATUS_NORMALSWING, static_cast<uint32_t>(aurEff->getEffectDamage()), 0, sdmg, 0, VisualState::ATTACK, 0, 0);
928 } break;
929 default:
930 break;
931 }
932 }
933 }
934 } break;
935 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL_PCT:
936 {
937 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
938
939 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
940 casterUnit->doSpellHealing(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
941 else
942 getOwner()->doSpellHealing(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
943 } break;
944 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_POWER_PCT:
945 {
946 if (!getOwner()->isAlive())
947 return;
948
949 const auto powerType = static_cast<PowerType>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
950 if (getOwner()->getMaxPower(powerType) == 0)
951 return;
952
953 // Hackfix from legacy method
954 const auto spellId = getSpellId() == 60069 ? 49766 : getSpellId();
955 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
956
957 // Send packet first
958 const auto unsignedValue = static_cast<uint32_t>(effectIntValue);
959 getOwner()->sendPeriodicAuraLog(m_casterGuid, getOwner()->GetNewGUID(), getSpellInfo(), unsignedValue, 0, 0, 0, aurEff->getAuraEffectType(), false, powerType);
960
961 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
962 casterUnit->energize(getOwner(), spellId, unsignedValue, powerType, false);
963 else
964 getOwner()->energize(getOwner(), spellId, unsignedValue, powerType, false);
965 } break;
966#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
967 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE:
968 {
969 customDamage = effectIntValue;
970 } [[fallthrough]];
971#endif
972 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL:
973 {
974 const auto triggerId = getSpellInfo()->getEffectTriggerSpell(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
975 const auto triggerInfo = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(triggerId);
976 if (triggerInfo == nullptr)
977 {
978 sLogger.failure("Aura::periodicTick : Periodic trigger aura effect has invalid spell id ({}) in aura id {}", triggerId, getSpellId());
979 return;
980 }
981
982 auto* const originalCaster = GetUnitCaster();
983 Unit* casterUnit = nullptr;
984 auto* target = getOwner();
985
986 // Note; some spells might need a spell script here to set correct caster and target
987
988 if (triggerInfo->isTriggerSpellCastedByCaster(getSpellInfo()))
989 casterUnit = originalCaster;
990 else
991 casterUnit = target;
992
993 // If spell is channeled, periodic target should be the channel object
994 if (originalCaster != nullptr && getSpellInfo()->isChanneled())
995 {
996 target = originalCaster->getWorldMapUnit(originalCaster->getChannelObjectGuid());
997 if (target == nullptr)
998 target = getOwner();
999 }
1000
1001 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1002 {
1003 Spell* triggerSpell = sSpellMgr.newSpell(casterUnit, triggerInfo, true, this);
1004#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
1005 if (aurEff->getAuraEffectType() == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE)
1006 {
1007 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
1008 triggerSpell->forced_basepoints->set(i, customDamage);
1009 }
1010#endif
1011
1012 SpellCastTargets spellTargets(0);
1013 spellTargets.addTargetMask(TARGET_FLAG_UNIT);
1014 spellTargets.setUnitTarget(target->getGuid());
1015
1016 triggerSpell->prepare(&spellTargets);
1017 }
1018 } break;
1019 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_ENERGIZE:
1020 {
1021 if (!getOwner()->isAlive())
1022 return;
1023
1024 const auto powerType = static_cast<PowerType>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
1025 if (getOwner()->getMaxPower(powerType) == 0)
1026 return;
1027
1028 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
1029
1030 // Send packet first
1031 const auto unsignedValue = static_cast<uint32_t>(effectIntValue);
1032 getOwner()->sendPeriodicAuraLog(m_casterGuid, getOwner()->GetNewGUID(), getSpellInfo(), unsignedValue, 0, 0, 0, aurEff->getAuraEffectType(), false, powerType);
1033
1034 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1035 casterUnit->energize(getOwner(), getSpellId(), unsignedValue, powerType, false);
1036 else
1037 getOwner()->energize(getOwner(), getSpellId(), unsignedValue, powerType, false);
1038 } break;
1039 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH:
1040 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEALTH_FUNNEL:
1041 {
1042 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
1043
1044 // Deal damage (heal part is called in doSpellDamage)
1045 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1046 casterUnit->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, true, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
1047 else
1048 getOwner()->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, true, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
1049 } break;
1050 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
1051 {
1052 if (!getOwner()->isAlive())
1053 return;
1054
1055 if (getOwner()->getMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA) == 0)
1056 return;
1057
1058 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
1059 if (getOwner()->m_schoolImmunityList[getSpellInfo()->getFirstSchoolFromSchoolMask()] != 0)
1060 {
1061 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1062 casterUnit->sendSpellOrDamageImmune(getCasterGuid(), getOwner(), getSpellId());
1063
1064 return;
1065 }
1066
1067 const auto manaLeech = std::min(effectIntValue, static_cast<int32_t>(getOwner()->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA)));
1068 getOwner()->modPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA, -manaLeech);
1069
1070 // If caster does not exist or is not alive, mana cannot be leeched
1071 if (casterUnit == nullptr || !casterUnit->isAlive())
1072 return;
1073
1074 const auto manaMultiplier = getSpellInfo()->getEffectMultipleValue(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
1075 const auto manaReturn = static_cast<int32_t>(manaLeech * manaMultiplier);
1076
1077 // Add leeched mana to caster
1078 const auto curPower = casterUnit->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA);
1079 const auto maxPower = casterUnit->getMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA);
1080 if (curPower + manaReturn >= maxPower)
1081 casterUnit->setPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA, maxPower);
1082 else
1083 casterUnit->modPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA, manaReturn);
1084
1085 getOwner()->sendPeriodicAuraLog(m_casterGuid, getOwner()->GetNewGUID(), getSpellInfo(), static_cast<uint32_t>(manaReturn), 0, 0, 0, aurEff->getAuraEffectType(), false, POWER_TYPE_MANA, manaMultiplier);
1086 } break;
1087 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE_PERCENT:
1088 {
1089 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
1090
1091 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1092 casterUnit->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
1093 else
1094 getOwner()->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), effectFloatValue, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
1095 } break;
1096 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_POWER_BURN:
1097 {
1098 if (!getOwner()->isAlive())
1099 return;
1100
1101 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
1102
1103 if (getOwner()->m_schoolImmunityList[getSpellInfo()->getFirstSchoolFromSchoolMask()] != 0)
1104 {
1105 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1106 casterUnit->sendSpellOrDamageImmune(getCasterGuid(), getOwner(), getSpellId());
1107
1108 return;
1109 }
1110
1111 const auto powerType = static_cast<PowerType>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
1112
1113 // Calculate power amount
1114 const auto powerAmount = std::min(effectIntValue, static_cast<int32_t>(getOwner()->getPower(powerType)));
1115 getOwner()->modPower(powerType, -powerAmount);
1116
1117 auto damage = powerAmount * getSpellInfo()->getEffectMultipleValue(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
1118 // Should do at least 1 damage (see Chromaggus and Brood Affliction: Blue)
1119 ///\ todo: verify this
1120 damage = std::max(1.0f, damage);
1121
1122 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1123 casterUnit->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), damage, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
1124 else
1125 getOwner()->doSpellDamage(getOwner(), getSpellId(), damage, aurEff->getEffectIndex(), pSpellId != 0, true, false, false, nullptr, this, aurEff);
1126 } break;
1127#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
1128 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_DUMMY:
1129 {
1130 // Drink spells use periodic dummy trigger since TBC
1131 const auto effIndex = aurEff->getEffectIndex();
1132 if (effIndex > 0 && getAuraEffect(effIndex - 1U)->getAuraEffectType() == SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN)
1133 {
1134 if (getPlayerOwner() == nullptr)
1135 return;
1136
1137 // Set this effect's value to the mana regen effect, so it will be removed when aura is removed
1138 m_auraEffects[effIndex - 1].setEffectDamage(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1139 getPlayerOwner()->updateManaRegeneration();
1140
1141 // Disable this periodic effect
1142 aurEff->setEffectAmplitude(0);
1143 return;
1144 }
1145
1146 // Check that the dummy effect is handled properly in spell script
1147 // In case it's not, generate warning to debug log
1148 const auto dummyResult = sScriptMgr.callScriptedAuraOnDummyEffect(this, aurEff, true);
1149 if (dummyResult == SpellScriptCheckDummy::DUMMY_OK)
1150 break;
1151
1152 if (sScriptMgr.CallScriptedDummyAura(getSpellId(), aurEff->getEffectIndex(), this, true))
1153 break;
1154
1155 sLogger.debugFlag(AscEmu::Logging::LF_AURA_EFF, "Spell aura {} has a periodic trigger dummy effect but no handler for it", getSpellId());
1156 } break;
1157#endif
1158 default:
1159 break;
1160 }
1161}
SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_POWER_PCT
@ SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_POWER_PCT
Definition AuraEffects.hpp:35

◆ refreshOrModifyStack()

void Aura::refreshOrModifyStack ( bool  saveMods = false,
int16_t  modifyStackAmount = 0 
)

Definition at line 427 of file SpellAura.cpp.

428{
429 int32_t maxStacks = getSpellInfo()->getMaxstack() == 0 ? 1 : static_cast<int32_t>(getSpellInfo()->getMaxstack());
430
431 // Check for aura stack cheat
432 const auto plrHolder = getPlayerOwner();
433 if (plrHolder != nullptr && plrHolder->m_cheats.hasAuraStackCheat)
434 maxStacks = 255;
435
436 const auto curStackCount = getStackCount();
437 int32_t newStackCount = curStackCount + modifyStackAmount;
438
439 if (modifyStackAmount < 0)
440 {
441 // If stack count reaches zero, remove aura
442 if (newStackCount <= 0)
443 {
444 removeAura();
445 return;
446 }
447 }
448 else
449 {
450 if (newStackCount >= maxStacks)
451 newStackCount = maxStacks;
452
453 // Recalculate aura modifiers on reapply or when stack count increases
454#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
455 // Before cata, aura's crit chance, attack power bonus and damage bonuses (NYI) were saved on aura refresh in special situations
456 if (!saveMods)
457 {
458 _calculateAttackPowerBonus();
459 _calculateCritChance();
460 }
461#else
462 _calculateAttackPowerBonus();
463 _calculateCritChance();
464#endif
465 _calculateSpellPowerBonus();
466 _calculateSpellHaste();
467
468 // Recalculate aura duration and effect amplitudes based on new haste
469 setMaxDuration(static_cast<int32_t>(m_originalDuration * m_spellHaste));
470 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
471 {
472 if (m_auraEffects[i].getAuraEffectType() == SPELL_AURA_NONE)
473 continue;
474
475 _calculateEffectAmplitude(i);
476 }
477
478 // Reset charges to max count
479 if (m_originalCharges > 0)
480 setCharges(m_originalCharges, false);
481
482 // Reset duration to max
483 setTimeLeft(getMaxDuration());
484 }
485
486 m_updatingModifiers = true;
487 const auto unsignedStackCount = static_cast<uint8_t>(newStackCount);
488 m_stackCount = unsignedStackCount;
489
490 // Reapply modifiers
491 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
492 {
493 if (m_auraEffects[i].getAuraEffectType() != SPELL_AURA_NONE)
494 {
495 m_auraEffects[i].applyEffect(false, true);
496 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectDamage(m_auraEffects[i].getEffectBaseDamage() * m_stackCount);
497 m_auraEffects[i].applyEffect(true, true);
498 }
499 }
500
501 m_updatingModifiers = false;
502 takeUsedSpellModifiers();
503
504 // Call script hook
505 sScriptMgr.callScriptedAuraOnRefreshOrGainNewStack(this, unsignedStackCount, curStackCount);
506
507#if VERSION_STRING < WotLK
508 getOwner()->setAuraApplication(this);
509#endif
510
511 // Send aura update
512 getOwner()->sendAuraUpdate(this, false);
513 getOwner()->updateAuraForGroup(m_visualSlot);
514}

◆ removeAura()

void Aura::removeAura ( AuraRemoveMode  mode = AURA_REMOVE_BY_SERVER)

\ todo: handle this in effects

Definition at line 173 of file SpellAura.cpp.

174{
175 sEventMgr.RemoveEvents(this);
176
177 // Check if aura has already been removed
178 if (m_isGarbage)
179 return;
180
181 sScriptMgr.callScriptedAuraOnRemove(this, mode);
182 sHookInterface.OnAuraRemove(this);
183
184 sLogger.debug("Removing aura {} from unit {}", getSpellId(), getOwner()->getGuid());
185
186 m_isGarbage = true;
187
188 // Reset diminishing return timer
189 getOwner()->removeDiminishingReturnTimer(getSpellInfo());
190
191 const auto caster = GetUnitCaster();
192 if (caster != nullptr)
193 {
194 /**********************Cooldown**************************
195 * this is only needed for some spells
196 * for now only spells that have:
197 * (m_spellInfo->Attributes == 0x2050000) && !(m_spellInfo->AttributesEx) ||
198 * m_spellProto->Attributes == 0x2040100
199 * are handled. Its possible there are more spells like this
200 *************************************************************/
201 if (caster->isPlayer() && caster->IsInWorld() && getSpellInfo()->custom_c_is_flags & SPELL_FLAG_IS_REQUIRECOOLDOWNUPDATE)
202 {
203 const auto p = static_cast<Player*>(caster);
204 p->sendSpellCooldownEventPacket(getSpellInfo()->getId());
205 }
206
207 // Far Sight effect
208 ///\ todo: handle this in effects
209 if (caster->isPlayer() && caster->IsInWorld() && static_cast<Player*>(caster)->getFarsightGuid() != 0)
210 {
211 uint8_t j = 0;
212 for (; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
213 if (getSpellInfo()->getEffect(j) == SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_FARSIGHT)
214 break;
215
216 if (j != MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS)
217 static_cast<Player*>(caster)->setFarsightGuid(0);
218 }
219
220 // If this aura can affect one target at a time, remove this target from the caster map
221 if (getSpellInfo()->getAttributesExE() & ATTRIBUTESEXE_SINGLE_TARGET_AURA && getOwner()->getAuraCountForId(getSpellId()) == 1)
222 getOwner()->removeSingleTargetGuidForAura(getSpellInfo()->getId());
223
224 // only remove channel stuff if caster == target, then it's not removed twice, for example, arcane missiles applies a dummy aura to target
225 if (caster == getOwner() && m_spellInfo->getChannelInterruptFlags() != 0)
226 {
227 caster->setChannelObjectGuid(0);
228 caster->setChannelSpellId(0);
229 }
230
231 if (caster->isPlayer() && getSpellInfo()->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON))
232 {
233 const auto charm = caster->getWorldMapUnit(caster->getCharmGuid());
234 if (charm != nullptr && charm->getCreatedBySpellId() == getSpellInfo()->getId())
235 caster->unPossess();
236 }
237 }
238
239 // Clear area aura targets
240 if (IsAreaAura() && getCasterGuid() == getOwner()->getGuid())
241 ClearAATargets();
242
243 // Send packet before removing modifiers
244 // Otherwise shapeshift spells can still appear active on stance bar -Appled
245 if (m_visualSlot < AuraSlots::NEGATIVE_VISUAL_SLOT_END)
246 {
247#if VERSION_STRING < WotLK
248 getOwner()->setAura(this, false);
249 getOwner()->setAuraFlags(this, false);
250 getOwner()->setAuraLevel(this);
251 getOwner()->setAuraApplication(this);
252#endif
253
254 getOwner()->m_auraVisualList[m_visualSlot] = 0;
255 getOwner()->sendAuraUpdate(this, true);
256 getOwner()->updateAuraForGroup(m_visualSlot);
257 }
258
259 // Remove aura from unit before removing modifiers
260 auto auraHolder = getOwner()->_removeAura(this);
261
262 // Remove all modifiers
263 removeAllAuraEffects();
264
265 // Remove aurastates
266 if (getSpellInfo()->getMechanicsType() == MECHANIC_ENRAGED && !--m_target->m_ascEnraged)
267 getOwner()->removeAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_ENRAGED);
268 else if (getSpellInfo()->getMechanicsType() == MECHANIC_BLEEDING && !--m_target->m_ascBleed)
269 getOwner()->removeAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_BLEED);
270 if (getSpellInfo()->custom_BGR_one_buff_on_target & SPELL_TYPE_SEAL && !--m_target->m_ascSeal)
271 getOwner()->removeAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_JUDGEMENT);
272
273 getOwner()->addGarbageAura(std::move(auraHolder));
274}

◆ SendDummyModifierLog()

void Aura::SendDummyModifierLog ( std::map< SpellInfo *, uint32_t > *  m,
SpellInfo *  spellInfo,
uint32_t  i,
bool  apply,
bool  pct = false 
)

Definition at line 3753 of file SpellAuras.Legacy.cpp.

3754{
3755 int32_t v = spellInfo->getEffectBasePoints(static_cast<uint8_t>(i)) + 1;
3756 auto* mask = spellInfo->getEffectSpellClassMask(static_cast<uint8_t>(i));
3757 uint8_t type = static_cast<uint8_t>(spellInfo->getEffectMiscValue(static_cast<uint8_t>(i)));
3758
3759 if (apply)
3760 {
3761 m->insert(std::make_pair(spellInfo, i));
3762 }
3763 else
3764 {
3765 v = -v;
3766 std::map<SpellInfo*, uint32_t>::iterator itr = m->find(spellInfo);
3767 if (itr != m->end())
3768 m->erase(itr);
3769 }
3770
3771#if VERSION_STRING >= Cata
3772 std::vector<std::pair<uint8_t, float>> modValues;
3773#endif
3774 uint32_t intbit = 0, groupnum = 0;
3775 for (uint8_t bit = 0; bit < SPELL_GROUPS; ++bit, ++intbit)
3776 {
3777 if (intbit == 32)
3778 {
3779 ++groupnum;
3780 intbit = 0;
3781 }
3782 if ((1 << intbit) & mask[groupnum])
3783 {
3784 if (p_target == nullptr)
3785 continue;
3786
3787#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
3788 p_target->sendSpellModifierPacket(bit, type, v, pct);
3789#else
3790 modValues.push_back(std::make_pair(bit, static_cast<float>(v)));
3791#endif
3792 }
3793 }
3794
3795#if VERSION_STRING >= Cata
3796 if (p_target != nullptr)
3797 p_target->sendSpellModifierPacket(type, modValues, pct);
3798
3799 modValues.clear();
3800#endif
3801}

3809 // Find spell of effect to be triggered
3810 SpellInfo const* sp = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(getSpellInfo()->getEffectTriggerSpell(aurEff->getEffectIndex()));
3811 if (sp == nullptr)
3812 {
3813 sLogger.debug("Warning! class trigger spell is null for spell {}", getSpellInfo()->getId());
3814 return;
3815 }
3816
3817 // Initialize proc class mask
3818 procClassMask[0] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 0);
3819 procClassMask[1] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 1);
3820 procClassMask[2] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 2);
3821
3822 // Initialize mask
3823 groupRelation[0] = sp->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 0);
3824 groupRelation[1] = sp->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 1);
3825 groupRelation[2] = sp->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 2);
3826
3827 m_target->addProcTriggerSpell(sp->getId(), getSpellInfo()->getId(), m_casterGuid, getSpellInfo()->getEffectBasePoints(aurEff->getEffectIndex()) + 1, SpellProcFlags(getSpellInfo()->getProcFlags()), EXTRA_PROC_NULL, groupRelation, procClassMask, this);
3828
3829 sLogger.debug("{} is registering {} chance {} flags {} charges {}", getSpellInfo()->getId(), sp->getId(), getSpellInfo()->getProcChance(), getSpellInfo()->getProcFlags(), getCharges());
3830 }
3831 else
3832 {
3833 // Find spell of effect to be triggered
3834 uint32_t spellId = getSpellInfo()->getEffectTriggerSpell(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
3835 if (spellId == 0)
3836 {
3837 sLogger.debug("Warning! trigger spell is null for spell {}", getSpellInfo()->getId());
3838 return;
3839 }
3840
3841 m_target->removeProcTriggerSpell(spellId, m_casterGuid);
3842 }
3843}

1831 {

1833 return;
1834 }
1835
1836 getOwner()->addSpellModifier(aurEff, apply);
1837
1838 // Attempt to prevent possible memory corruption
1839 // Multiple spells could use this same spell modifier, and when the first spell removes this modifier
1840 // the second spell has a modifier at invalid memory address
1841 // Anyhow, the chance for this to happen is rather low
1842 if (!apply)
1843 {

Definition at line 1051 of file SpellAuraEffects.cpp.

1052{
1053 // Check that the dummy effect is handled properly in spell script
1054 // In case it's not, generate warning to debug log
1055 const auto scriptResult = sScriptMgr.callScriptedAuraOnDummyEffect(this, aurEff, apply);
1056 if (scriptResult == SpellScriptCheckDummy::DUMMY_OK)
1057 return;
1058
1059 if (sScriptMgr.CallScriptedDummyAura(getSpellId(), aurEff->getEffectIndex(), this, apply))
1060 return;
1061
1062 sLogger.debugFlag(AscEmu::Logging::LF_AURA_EFF, "Aura::spellAuraEffectDummy : Spell {} ({}) has a dummy aura effect, but no handler for it.", m_spellInfo->getId(), m_spellInfo->getName());
1063}

1768{
1769 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() == 0)
1770 return;
1771
1772 // Update only necessary powers, the rest are handled in regeneratePower
1773 switch (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
1774 {
1775 case POWER_TYPE_MANA:
1776 // TODO: missing update for creatures
1777 if (getPlayerOwner() == nullptr)
1778 break;
1779 getPlayerOwner()->updateManaRegeneration();
1780 break;
1781 case POWER_TYPE_RAGE:
1782 if (getPlayerOwner() == nullptr)
1783 break;
1784 getPlayerOwner()->updateRageRegeneration();
1785 break;
1786 case POWER_TYPE_FOCUS:
1787 getOwner()->updateFocusRegeneration();
1788 break;
1789 case POWER_TYPE_ENERGY:
1790 getOwner()->updateEnergyRegeneration();
1791 break;
1792#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
1793 case POWER_TYPE_RUNIC_POWER:
1794 if (getPlayerOwner() == nullptr)
1795 break;
1796 getPlayerOwner()->updateRunicPowerRegeneration();
1797 break;
1798#endif
1799 default:
1800 break;
1801 }
1802}

Definition at line 1218 of file SpellAuraEffects.cpp.

1219{
1220 // Dismount
1221 if (p_target != nullptr)
1222 {
1223 switch (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
1224 {
1225 case FORM_BATTLESTANCE:
1226 case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
1227 case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE:
1228 break;
1229 default:
1230 p_target->dismount();
1231 break;
1232 }
1233 }
1234
1235 const auto shapeshiftForm = sSpellShapeshiftFormStore.lookupEntry(static_cast<uint32_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()));
1236 if (shapeshiftForm == nullptr)
1237 return;
1238
1239 const auto oldForm = getOwner()->getShapeShiftForm();
1240 const uint8_t newForm = apply ? static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()) : FORM_NORMAL;
1241
1242 // Remove previous shapeshift aura on apply
1243 if (apply)
1244 getOwner()->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT, getSpellId());
1245
1246 // Some forms have two additional hidden passive aura
1247 uint32_t passiveSpellId = 0, secondaryPassiveSpell = 0;
1248#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
1249 auto modelId = shapeshiftForm->modelId;
1250#else
1251 uint32_t modelId = 0;
1252#endif
1253 auto freeMovements = false, removePolymorph = false;
1254
1255 switch (shapeshiftForm->id)
1256 {
1257 case FORM_CAT:
1258 {
1259 freeMovements = true;
1260 removePolymorph = true;
1261 passiveSpellId = 3025;
1262
1263 // todo: there should be other model ids as well
1264 if (getOwner()->getRace() == RACE_TAUREN)
1265 modelId = 8571;
1266
1267 if (apply)
1268 {
1269 getOwner()->setPowerType(POWER_TYPE_ENERGY);
1270 getOwner()->setMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_ENERGY, 100);
1271 getOwner()->setPower(POWER_TYPE_ENERGY, 0);
1272 }
1273 else
1274 {
1275 getOwner()->setPowerType(POWER_TYPE_MANA);
1276 // Remove Prowl
1277 getOwner()->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH);
1278 }
1279 } break;
1280 case FORM_TREE:
1281 {
1282 freeMovements = true;
1283 removePolymorph = true;
1284 passiveSpellId = 5420;
1285 secondaryPassiveSpell = 34123;
1286 } break;
1287 case FORM_TRAVEL:
1288 {
1289 freeMovements = true;
1290 removePolymorph = true;
1291 passiveSpellId = 5419;
1292 } break;
1293 case FORM_AQUA:
1294 {
1295 freeMovements = true;
1296 removePolymorph = true;
1297 passiveSpellId = 5421;
1298 } break;
1299 case FORM_BEAR:
1300 {
1301 freeMovements = true;
1302 removePolymorph = true;
1303 passiveSpellId = 1178;
1304 secondaryPassiveSpell = 21178;
1305
1306 // todo: there should be other model ids as well
1307 if (getOwner()->getRace() == RACE_TAUREN)
1308 modelId = 2289;
1309
1310 if (apply)
1311 {
1312 getOwner()->setPowerType(POWER_TYPE_RAGE);
1313 getOwner()->setMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_RAGE, 1000);
1314 getOwner()->setPower(POWER_TYPE_RAGE, 0);
1315 }
1316 else
1317 {
1318 getOwner()->setPowerType(POWER_TYPE_MANA);
1319 }
1320 } break;
1321 case FORM_GHOUL:
1322 case FORM_SKELETON:
1323 case FORM_ZOMBIE:
1324 {
1325 if (getPlayerOwner() != nullptr)
1326 getPlayerOwner()->sendAvailSpells(shapeshiftForm, apply);
1327 } break;
1328 case FORM_DIREBEAR:
1329 {
1330 freeMovements = true;
1331 removePolymorph = true;
1332 passiveSpellId = 9635;
1333 // Same spell as in Bear Form, increases threat generate
1334 secondaryPassiveSpell = 21178;
1335
1336 // todo: there should be other model ids as well
1337 if (getOwner()->getRace() == RACE_TAUREN)
1338 modelId = 2289;
1339
1340 if (apply)
1341 {
1342 getOwner()->setPowerType(POWER_TYPE_RAGE);
1343 getOwner()->setMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_RAGE, 1000);
1344 getOwner()->setPower(POWER_TYPE_RAGE, 0);
1345 }
1346 else
1347 {
1348 getOwner()->setPowerType(POWER_TYPE_MANA);
1349 }
1350 } break;
1351 case FORM_BATTLESTANCE:
1352 case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
1353 case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE:
1354 {
1355 if (shapeshiftForm->id == FORM_BATTLESTANCE)
1356 passiveSpellId = 21156;
1357 else if (shapeshiftForm->id == FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE)
1358 passiveSpellId = 7376;
1359 else if (shapeshiftForm->id == FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE)
1360 passiveSpellId = 7381;
1361
1362 // Check retained rage
1363 if (apply && getPlayerOwner() != nullptr && getPlayerOwner()->isClassWarrior())
1364 {
1365 if (getPlayerOwner()->getPower(POWER_TYPE_RAGE) > getPlayerOwner()->m_retaineDrage)
1366 getPlayerOwner()->setPower(POWER_TYPE_RAGE, getPlayerOwner()->m_retaineDrage);
1367 }
1368 } break;
1369#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
1370 case FORM_METAMORPHOSIS:
1371 {
1372 // This form has a lot of passive auras
1373 if (apply)
1374 {
1375 // Stun and slow reduction
1376 getOwner()->castSpell(getOwner(), 54817, true);
1377 // Demonic language
1378 getOwner()->castSpell(getOwner(), 54879, true);
1379 // Enslave immunity
1380 getOwner()->castSpell(getOwner(), 61610, true);
1381 }
1382 else
1383 {
1384 getOwner()->removeAllAurasById(54817);
1385 getOwner()->removeAllAurasById(54879);
1386 getOwner()->removeAllAurasById(61610);
1387 }
1388 } break;
1389#endif
1390 // Druid's epic flying form
1391 case FORM_SWIFT:
1392 {
1393 freeMovements = true;
1394 removePolymorph = true;
1395 passiveSpellId = 40121;
1396 secondaryPassiveSpell = 40122;
1397
1398 // todo: there should be other model ids as well
1399 if (getOwner()->getRace() == RACE_TAUREN)
1400 modelId = 21244;
1401 } break;
1402 case FORM_SHADOW:
1403 {
1404#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
1405 passiveSpellId = 49868;
1406#endif
1407 // todo: is this needed?
1408 if (apply && getPlayerOwner() != nullptr)
1409 getPlayerOwner()->sendSpellCooldownEventPacket(getSpellId());
1410 } break;
1411 case FORM_FLIGHT:
1412 {
1413 freeMovements = true;
1414 removePolymorph = true;
1415 passiveSpellId = 33948;
1416 secondaryPassiveSpell = 34764;
1417
1418 // todo: there should be other model ids as well
1419 if (getOwner()->getRace() == RACE_TAUREN)
1420 modelId = 20872;
1421 } break;
1422 case FORM_MOONKIN:
1423 {
1424 freeMovements = true;
1425 removePolymorph = true;
1426 passiveSpellId = 24905;
1427
1428 // todo: there should be other model ids as well
1429 if (getOwner()->getRace() == RACE_TAUREN)
1430 modelId = 15375;
1431 } break;
1432 case FORM_SPIRITOFREDEMPTION:
1433 {
1434 passiveSpellId = 27795;
1435 } break;
1436 }
1437
1438 if (freeMovements)
1439 {
1440 getOwner()->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED, true);
1441 getOwner()->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
1442 }
1443
1444 if (apply)
1445 {
1446 if (removePolymorph && getOwner()->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_POLYMORPHED))
1447 getOwner()->removeAllAurasById(getOwner()->getTransformAura());
1448
1449 if (modelId != 0)
1450 {
1451 // By default shapeshifting overwrites transforms
1452 auto overWriteDisplay = true;
1453
1454 const auto transformSpell = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(getOwner()->getTransformAura());
1455 if (transformSpell != nullptr)
1456 {
1457 // Check if the transform spell has higher priority
1458 // Also, check for skeleton transforms (i.e. Noggenfogger Elixir) which overwrite shapeshifting in Classic
1459 const auto takePriority = (transformSpell->getAttributes() & ATTRIBUTES_IGNORE_INVULNERABILITY && transformSpell->getAttributesEx() & ATTRIBUTESEX_NO_INITIAL_AGGRO) || transformSpell->getAttributesExC() & ATTRIBUTESEXC_HIGH_PRIORITY;
1460 if (takePriority || transformSpell->isNegativeAura()
1461#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
1462 || transformSpell->getAttributes() == 0x28000000
1463#endif
1464 )
1465 overWriteDisplay = false;
1466 }
1467
1468 if (overWriteDisplay)
1469 {
1470 getOwner()->setDisplayId(modelId);
1471 getOwner()->eventModelChange();
1472 }
1473
1474 // Save model id for later use
1475 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(modelId);
1476 }
1477
1478 getOwner()->setShapeShiftForm(newForm);
1479
1480 if (passiveSpellId != 0)
1481 getOwner()->castSpell(getOwner(), passiveSpellId, true);
1482 if (secondaryPassiveSpell != 0)
1483 getOwner()->castSpell(getOwner(), secondaryPassiveSpell, true);
1484 }
1485 else
1486 {
1487 getOwner()->setShapeShiftForm(newForm);
1488 getOwner()->restoreDisplayId();
1489
1490 if (passiveSpellId != 0)
1491 getOwner()->removeAllAurasById(passiveSpellId);
1492 if (secondaryPassiveSpell != 0)
1493 getOwner()->removeAllAurasById(secondaryPassiveSpell);
1494 }
1495
1496 // Remove auras which unit should not have anymore
1497 for (uint16_t i = AuraSlots::PASSIVE_SLOT_START; i < AuraSlots::POSITIVE_SLOT_END; ++i)
1498 {
1499 auto* const aur = getOwner()->getAuraWithAuraSlot(i);
1500 if (aur == nullptr)
1501 continue;
1502
1503 const auto requiredForm = aur->getSpellInfo()->getRequiredShapeShift();
1504 if (requiredForm != 0)
1505 {
1506 if (oldForm != FORM_NORMAL && oldForm != FORM_SHADOW && oldForm != FORM_STEALTH)
1507 {
1508 const uint32_t oldFormMask = 1U << (oldForm - 1);
1509 const uint32_t newFormMask = 1U << (newForm - 1);
1510 // Check if the aura is usable in new form
1511 if (oldFormMask & requiredForm && !(newFormMask & requiredForm))
1512 {
1513 aur->removeAura();
1514 continue;
1515 }
1516 }
1517 }
1518 }
1519
1520 if (getPlayerOwner() != nullptr)
1521 {
1522 // Apply talents and spells that require this form
1523 for (const auto& spell : getPlayerOwner()->getSpellSet())
1524 {
1525 const auto spellInfo = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spell);
1526 if (spellInfo == nullptr)
1527 continue;
1528
1529 if (spellInfo->isPassive() && spellInfo->getRequiredShapeShift() > 0)
1530 {
1531 const uint32_t newFormMask = 1U << (newForm - 1);
1532 if (newFormMask & spellInfo->getRequiredShapeShift())
1533 getPlayerOwner()->castSpell(getPlayerOwner(), spellInfo, true);
1534 }
1535 }
1536
1537 // Feral attack power
1538 if (getPlayerOwner()->isClassDruid())
1539 {
1540 // Change from normal form to feral form
1541 if (!(oldForm == FORM_MOONKIN || oldForm == FORM_CAT || oldForm == FORM_BEAR || oldForm == FORM_DIREBEAR) &&
1542 (newForm == FORM_MOONKIN || newForm == FORM_CAT || newForm == FORM_BEAR || newForm == FORM_DIREBEAR))
1543 getPlayerOwner()->applyFeralAttackPower(true);
1544 // Change from feral form to normal form
1545 else if ((oldForm == FORM_MOONKIN || oldForm == FORM_CAT || oldForm == FORM_BEAR || oldForm == FORM_DIREBEAR) &&
1546 !(newForm == FORM_MOONKIN || newForm == FORM_CAT || newForm == FORM_BEAR || newForm == FORM_DIREBEAR))
1547 getPlayerOwner()->applyFeralAttackPower(false);
1548 }
1549
1550 // Apply dummy shapeshift spells
1551 for (const auto& spell : getPlayerOwner()->getShapeshiftSpells())
1552 {
1553 const auto spellInfo = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spell);
1554 if (spellInfo == nullptr)
1555 continue;
1556
1557 const uint32_t newFormMask = 1U << (newForm - 1);
1558 if (spellInfo->getRequiredShapeShift() > 0 && (newFormMask & spellInfo->getRequiredShapeShift()))
1559 getPlayerOwner()->castSpell(getPlayerOwner(), spellInfo, true);
1560 }
1561
1562 // Hackfix - Heart of the Wild talent
1563 getPlayerOwner()->eventTalentHearthOfWildChange(apply);
1564
1565 getPlayerOwner()->updateStats();
1566 getPlayerOwner()->updateAttackSpeed();
1567 }
1568}
SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT

Definition at line 937 of file SpellAuraEffects.cpp.

938{
939 if (apply)
940 {
941 // Hackfixes from legacy aura effect
942 // Move these to spellscript
943 switch (getSpellInfo()->getId())
944 {
945 //mage talent ignite
946 case 12654:
947 {
948 if (!pSpellId) //we need a parent spell and should always have one since it procs on it
949 break;
950 SpellInfo const* parentsp = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(pSpellId);
951 if (!parentsp)
952 return;
953 auto c = GetUnitCaster();
954 if (c != nullptr && c->isPlayer())
955 {
956 aurEff->setEffectDamage(Util::float2int32(static_cast<Player*>(c)->m_castedAmount[SCHOOL_FIRE] * parentsp->getEffectBasePoints(0) / 100.0f));
957 }
958 else if (c != nullptr)
959 {
960 if (!aurEff->getEffectDamage())
961 return;
962
963 Spell* spell = sSpellMgr.newSpell(c, parentsp, false, nullptr);
964 SpellCastTargets castTargets(m_target->getGuid());
965
966 //this is so not good, maybe parent spell has more then dmg effect and we use it to calc our new dmg :(
967 aurEff->setEffectDamage(0);
968 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
969 {
970 const auto curVal = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
971 aurEff->setEffectDamage(curVal + (spell->calculateEffect(i) * parentsp->getEffectBasePoints(0) / 100));
972 }
973 delete spell;
974 spell = nullptr;
975 }
976
977 }
978 // Warrior deep wounds
979 case 12162:
980 case 12721:
981 {
982 auto c = GetUnitCaster();
983 if (!c->isPlayer())
984 break;
985
986 uint32_t multiplyer = 0;
987 if (pSpellId == 12834)
988 multiplyer = 16; //level 1 of the talent should apply 16 of average melee weapon dmg
989 else if (pSpellId == 12849)
990 multiplyer = 32;
991 else if (pSpellId == 12867)
992 multiplyer = 48;
993
994 if (multiplyer)
995 {
996 Player* pr = static_cast<Player*>(c);
997 Item* it;
998 it = pr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND);
999 if (it)
1000 {
1001 aurEff->setEffectDamage(0);
1002 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_DAMAGES; ++i)
1003 if (it->getItemProperties()->Damage[i].Type == SCHOOL_NORMAL)
1004 aurEff->setEffectDamage(aurEff->getEffectDamage() + int32_t((it->getItemProperties()->Damage[i].Min + it->getItemProperties()->Damage[i].Max) / 2));
1005 aurEff->setEffectDamage((int32_t)multiplyer * aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100);
1006 }
1007 }
1008 }
1009 }
1010
1011 // Hackfixes end
1012
1013 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
1014 float_t damage = aurEff->getEffectFloatDamage();
1015
1016 // Get bonus damage from spell power and attack power
1017 if (casterUnit != nullptr && !aurEff->isEffectDamageStatic())
1018 damage = casterUnit->applySpellDamageBonus(getSpellInfo(), aurEff->getEffectDamage(), aurEff->getEffectPercentModifier(), true, nullptr, this);
1019
1020 if (damage <= 0.0f)
1021 return;
1022
1023 aurEff->setEffectDamage(damage);
1024
1025 // Set periodic timer only if timer was resetted
1026 if (m_periodicTimer[aurEff->getEffectIndex()] == 0)
1027 m_periodicTimer[aurEff->getEffectIndex()] = aurEff->getEffectAmplitude();
1028
1029 // Hackfixes from legacy aura effect
1030 if (getSpellInfo()->custom_BGR_one_buff_on_target & SPELL_TYPE_WARLOCK_IMMOLATE)
1031 m_target->addAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_CONFLAGRATE);
1032 //maybe poison aurastate should get triggered on other spells too ?
1033 else if (getSpellInfo()->custom_c_is_flags & SPELL_FLAG_IS_POISON) //deadly poison
1034 m_target->addAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_ENVENOM);
1035 }
1036 else
1037 {
1038#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
1039 // Prior to cata periodic timer was resetted on refresh
1040 m_periodicTimer[aurEff->getEffectIndex()] = 0;
1041#endif
1042
1043 if (m_spellInfo->custom_BGR_one_buff_on_target & SPELL_TYPE_WARLOCK_IMMOLATE)
1044 m_target->removeAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_CONFLAGRATE);
1045 //maybe poison aurastate should get triggered on other spells too ?
1046 else if (m_spellInfo->custom_c_is_flags & SPELL_FLAG_IS_POISON) //deadly poison
1047 m_target->removeAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_ENVENOM);
1048 }
1049}

void Aura::spellAuraEffectPeriodicLeech ( AuraEffectModifier *  aurEff,
bool  apply 
)

Definition at line 1570 of file SpellAuraEffects.cpp.

1571{
1572 if (apply)
1573 {
1574 const auto casterUnit = GetUnitCaster();
1575 float_t damage = aurEff->getEffectFloatDamage();
1576
1577 // Get bonus damage from spell power and attack power
1578 if (casterUnit != nullptr && !aurEff->isEffectDamageStatic())
1579 damage = casterUnit->applySpellDamageBonus(getSpellInfo(), aurEff->getEffectDamage(), aurEff->getEffectPercentModifier(), true, nullptr, this);
1580
1581 if (casterUnit != nullptr)
1582 {
1583#if VERSION_STRING <= Cata
1584 // Hackfix from legacy method
1585 // Apply bonus from [Warlock] Soul Siphon
1586 if (casterUnit->m_soulSiphon.m_amount)
1587 {
1588 // Use std::map to prevent counting duplicate auras (stacked ones, from the same unit)
1589 std::map<uint64_t, std::unique_ptr<std::set<uint32_t>>> auras;
1590 std::map<uint64_t, std::unique_ptr<std::set<uint32_t>>>::iterator itx, itx2;
1591 int32_t pct;
1592 int32_t count = 0;
1593
1594 auras.clear();
1595 for (uint16_t i = AuraSlots::TOTAL_SLOT_START; i < AuraSlots::TOTAL_SLOT_END; ++i)
1596 {
1597 Aura* aura = m_target->getAuraWithAuraSlot(i);
1598 if (aura == nullptr)
1599 continue;
1600
1601 if (aura->getSpellInfo()->getSpellFamilyName() != 5)
1602 continue;
1603
1604 auto _continue = false;
1605 const auto spellSkillRange = sSpellMgr.getSkillEntryRangeForSpell(aura->getSpellId());
1606 for (const auto& [_, skill_line_ability] : spellSkillRange)
1607 {
1608 if (skill_line_ability->skilline != SKILL_AFFLICTION)
1609 {
1610 _continue = true;
1611 break;
1612 }
1613 }
1614
1615 if (_continue)
1616 continue;
1617
1618 itx = auras.find(aura->getCasterGuid());
1619 if (itx == auras.end())
1620 {
1621 const auto [insertItr, _] = auras.emplace(aura->getCasterGuid(), std::make_unique<std::set<uint32_t>>());
1622 itx = insertItr;
1623 }
1624
1625 const auto& ids = itx->second;
1626 if (ids->find(aura->getSpellId()) == ids->end())
1627 {
1628 ids->insert(aura->getSpellId());
1629 }
1630 }
1631
1632 if (auras.size())
1633 {
1634 itx = auras.begin();
1635 while (itx != auras.end())
1636 {
1637 itx2 = itx++;
1638 count += (int32_t)itx2->second->size();
1639 }
1640 }
1641
1642 pct = count * casterUnit->m_soulSiphon.m_amount;
1643 if (pct > casterUnit->m_soulSiphon.m_max)
1644 pct = casterUnit->m_soulSiphon.m_max;
1645 damage += aurEff->getEffectFloatDamage() * pct / 100;
1646 }
1647#endif
1648 }
1649
1650 aurEff->setEffectDamage(damage);
1651
1652 // Set periodic timer only if timer was resetted
1653 if (m_periodicTimer[aurEff->getEffectIndex()] == 0)
1654 m_periodicTimer[aurEff->getEffectIndex()] = aurEff->getEffectAmplitude();
1655 }
1656 else
1657 {
1658#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
1659 // Prior to cata periodic timer was resetted on refresh
1660 m_periodicTimer[aurEff->getEffectIndex()] = 0;
1661#endif
1662 }
1663}

Definition at line 1665 of file SpellAuraEffects.cpp.

1666{
1667 if (apply)
1668 {
1669 uint32_t displayId = 0;
1670 std::vector<uint32_t> displayIds;
1671 const auto properties = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(static_cast<uint32_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()));
1672 if (properties == nullptr)
1673 {
1674 sLogger.debugFlag(AscEmu::Logging::LF_AURA_EFF, "Aura::spellAuraEffectTransform : Unknown creature entry {} in misc value for spell {}", aurEff->getEffectMiscValue(), getSpellId());
1675 return;
1676 }
1677
1678 // Take all possible display ids from creature properties
1679 if (properties->Male_DisplayID != 0)
1680 displayIds.push_back(properties->Male_DisplayID);
1681 if (properties->Female_DisplayID != 0)
1682 displayIds.push_back(properties->Female_DisplayID);
1683 if (properties->Male_DisplayID2 != 0)
1684 displayIds.push_back(properties->Male_DisplayID2);
1685 if (properties->Female_DisplayID2 != 0)
1686 displayIds.push_back(properties->Female_DisplayID2);
1687
1688 if (displayIds.size() > 0)
1689 displayId = displayIds[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(displayIds.size() - 1))];
1690
1691 if (displayId == 0)
1692 {
1693 sLogger.debugFlag(AscEmu::Logging::LF_AURA_EFF, "Aura::spellAuraEffectTransform : Creature entry {} has no display id for spell {}", properties->Id, getSpellId());
1694 return;
1695 }
1696
1697 const auto transformAura = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(getOwner()->getTransformAura());
1698 if (transformAura == nullptr || !transformAura->isNegativeAura())
1699 {
1700 // Check if there is an existing transform with higher priority
1701 const auto takePriority = transformAura != nullptr && ((transformAura->getAttributes() & ATTRIBUTES_IGNORE_INVULNERABILITY && transformAura->getAttributesEx() & ATTRIBUTESEX_NO_INITIAL_AGGRO) || transformAura->getAttributesExC() & ATTRIBUTESEXC_HIGH_PRIORITY);
1702 if (getSpellInfo()->isNegativeAura() || !(transformAura != nullptr && takePriority))
1703 {
1704 getOwner()->setDisplayId(displayId);
1705 getOwner()->eventModelChange();
1706
1707 getOwner()->setTransformAura(getSpellId());
1708 }
1709 }
1710
1711 // Save model id for later use
1712 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(displayId);
1713 }
1714 else
1715 {
1716 if (getOwner()->getTransformAura() == getSpellId())
1717 getOwner()->setTransformAura(0);
1718
1719 getOwner()->restoreDisplayId();
1720 }
1721}

2793 {
2794 if (apply)
2795 {
2796 p_target->eventAttackStop();
2797 p_target->setDeathState(ALIVE);
2798
2799#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
2800 p_target->addUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
2801#endif
2802 p_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FEIGN_DEATH);
2803 p_target->addDynamicFlags(U_DYN_FLAG_DEAD);
2804
2805 //now get rid of mobs agro. pTarget->m_combatStatusHandler.AttackersForgetHate() - this works only for already attacking mobs
2806 for (const auto& itr : p_target->getInRangeObjectsSet())
2807 {
2808 if (itr && itr->isCreatureOrPlayer() && static_cast<Unit*>(itr)->isAlive())
2809 {
2810 Unit* u = static_cast<Unit*>(itr);
2811 if (isFeignDeathResisted(p_target->getLevel(), u->getLevel()))
2812 {
2813 removeAura();
2814 return;
2815 }
2816 if (u->isCreature())
2817 u->getThreatManager().clearThreat(p_target);
2818
2819 //if this is player and targeting us then we interrupt cast
2820 if (u->isPlayer())
2821 {
2822 Player* plr = static_cast<Player*>(itr);
2823 if (plr->isCastingSpell())
2824 plr->interruptSpell(); // cancel current casting spell
2825 }
2826 }
2827 }
2828
2829 // this looks awkward!
2830 p_target->sendMirrorTimer(MIRROR_TYPE_FIRE, getTimeLeft(), getTimeLeft(), 0xFFFFFFFF);
2831
2832 p_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_COMBAT);
2833
2834 /*if (p_target->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_ATTACKING))
2835 p_target->removeUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_ATTACKING);*/
2836
2837 p_target->sendPacket(SmsgCancelCombat().serialise().get());
2838
2839 // Send server-side cancel message
2840 WorldPacket data(SMSG_CANCEL_AUTO_REPEAT, 8);
2841 data << p_target->GetNewGUID();
2842 p_target->sendMessageToSet(&data, false);
2843 }

2845 {
2846#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
2847 p_target->removeUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
2848#endif
2849 p_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FEIGN_DEATH);
2850 p_target->removeDynamicFlags(U_DYN_FLAG_DEAD);
2851 p_target->sendStopMirrorTimerPacket(MIRROR_TYPE_FIRE);
2852 }
2853 }

5381 }

750 uint32_t Flag = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();

756 mPositive = true;

901{
902 Player* caster = GetPlayerCaster();
903 if (caster == nullptr)
904 return;
905 if (!m_target->isCreature())
906 return;
907
908 Creature* target = static_cast< Creature* >(m_target);
909
910 if (target->isTotem())
911 return;
912
913 mPositive = true; //we ignore the other 2 effect of this spell and force it to be a positive spell
914
915 if (apply)
916 {
917 if ((int32_t)m_target->getLevel() > aurEff->getEffectDamage() || m_target->isPet())
918 return;
919
920 // this should be done properly
921 if (target->GetEnslaveCount() >= 10)
922 return;
923
924 if (caster->getCharmGuid() != 0)
925 return;
926
927 m_target->addUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_CHARMED);
928 m_target->setCharmTempVal(m_target->getFactionTemplate());
929 m_target->setFaction(caster->getFactionTemplate());
930 m_target->updateInRangeOppositeFactionSet();

932 m_target->setCharmedByGuid(caster->getGuid());
933 caster->setCharmGuid(target->getGuid());
934 //damn it, the other effects of enslave demon will agro him on us anyway :S
935 m_target->getThreatManager().clearAllThreat();
936
937 target->SetEnslaveCount(target->GetEnslaveCount() + 1);
938
939 if (caster->getSession()) // crashfix
940 {
941 target->sendSpellsToController(caster, getMaxDuration());
942 target->SetEnslaveSpell(m_spellInfo->getId());
943 }
944 }
945 else
946 {
947 m_target->removeUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_CHARMED);
948 m_target->setFaction(m_target->getCharmTempVal());
949 m_target->getThreatManager().clearAllThreat();
950 m_target->updateInRangeOppositeFactionSet();

952 m_target->setCharmedByGuid(0);
953
954 if (caster->getSession() != nullptr) // crashfix
955 {
956 caster->setCharmGuid(0);
957 caster->sendEmptyPetSpellList();

959 }
960 }

◆ SpellAuraModConfuse()

void Aura::SpellAuraModConfuse ( AuraEffectModifier *  aurEff,
bool  apply 
)

Definition at line 844 of file SpellAuras.Legacy.cpp.

845{
846 Unit* u_caster = GetUnitCaster();
847
848 if (m_target->isTotem())
849 return;
850
851 if (apply)
852 {
853 if (u_caster == nullptr) return;
854
855 // Check Mechanic Immunity
856 if (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_DISORIENTED]
857 || (m_spellInfo->getMechanicsType() == MECHANIC_POLYMORPHED && m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_POLYMORPHED])
858 )
859 {
860 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
861 return;
862 }
863 mPositive = false;
864 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED);
865 m_target->interruptSpell();
866
867 m_target->setAItoUse(true);
868 m_target->setControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED);
869 m_target->getThreatManager().evaluateSuppressed();
870
871 if (p_target)
872 {
873 // this is a hackfix to stop player from moving -> see AIInterface::_UpdateMovement() Wander AI for more info
874 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 0);
875
876 p_target->speedCheatDelay(getTimeLeft());
877 }
878 }
879 else if ((m_flags & (1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex())) == 0) //add these checks to mods where immunity can cancel only 1 mod and not whole spell
880 {
881 m_target->setControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED);
882 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED);
883 if (p_target)
884 p_target->speedCheatReset();
885
886 if (p_target)
887 {
888 // re-enable movement
889 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 1);
890
891 m_target->setAItoUse(false);
892 }
893 else
894 {
895 m_target->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(u_caster);
896 }
897 }
898}

@ MECHANIC_DISORIENTED

3669 mPositive = true;

3672 }

Definition at line 963 of file SpellAuras.Legacy.cpp.

964{
965 Unit* u_caster = GetUnitCaster();
966
967 if (m_target->isCreature() &&
968 (m_target->isTotem() || m_target->isRooted()))
969 return;
970
971 if (apply)
972 {
973 if (u_caster == nullptr) return;
974 // Check Mechanic Immunity
975 if (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_FLEEING])
976 {
977 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
978 return;
979 }
980
981 mPositive = false;
982 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING);
983 m_target->setAItoUse(true);
984 m_target->getAIInterface()->handleEvent(EVENT_FEAR, u_caster, 0);
985 m_target->m_fearModifiers++;
986 if (p_target)
987 {
988 // this is a hackfix to stop player from moving -> see AIInterface::_UpdateMovement() Fear AI for more info
989 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 0);
990
991 p_target->speedCheatDelay(getTimeLeft());
992 }
993 }
994 else if ((m_flags & (1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex())) == 0) //add these checks to mods where immunity can cancel only 1 mod and not whole spell
995 {
996 m_target->m_fearModifiers--;
997
998 if (m_target->m_fearModifiers <= 0)
999 {
1000 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING);
1001 m_target->getAIInterface()->handleEvent(EVENT_UNFEAR, nullptr, 0);
1002
1003 if (p_target)
1004 {
1005 // re-enable movement
1006 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 1);
1007
1008 m_target->setAItoUse(false);
1009 p_target->speedCheatReset();
1010 }
1011 else
1012 {
1013 m_target->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(u_caster);
1014 }
1015 }
1016 }
1017}

3300{
3301 Unit* source = nullptr; // This is the Unit whose damage we are splitting
3302 Unit* destination = nullptr; // This is the Unit that shares the beating
3303 Object* caster = getCaster();
3304
3305 // We don't want to split our damage with the owner
3306 if (
3307#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
3308 (m_spellInfo->getEffect(aurEff->getEffectIndex()) == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_OWNER_AREA_AURA) &&
3309#endif
3310 (caster != nullptr) &&
3311 (m_target != nullptr) &&
3312 caster->isPet() &&
3313 caster->getGuid() == m_target->getGuid())
3314 return;
3315
3316 if (m_areaAura)
3317 {
3318 source = getOwner();
3319 destination = GetUnitCaster();
3320 }
3321 else
3322 {
3323 source = GetUnitCaster();
3324 destination = getOwner();
3325 }
3326
3327 if (source == nullptr || destination == nullptr)
3328 return;
3329
3330 if (source->m_damageSplitTarget != nullptr)
3331 {
3332 source->m_damageSplitTarget = nullptr;
3333 }
3334
3335 if (apply)
3336 {
3337 auto ds = std::make_unique<DamageSplitTarget>();
3338 ds->m_flatDamageSplit = 0;
3339 ds->m_spellId = getSpellInfo()->getId();
3340 ds->m_pctDamageSplit = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() / 100.0f;
3341 ds->damage_type = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getAuraEffectType());
3342 ds->creator = (void*)this;
3343 ds->m_target = destination->getGuid();
3344 source->m_damageSplitTarget = std::move(ds);
3345 }
3346 else
3347 {
3348 source->m_damageSplitTarget = nullptr;
3349 }
3350}

◆ takeUsedSpellModifiers()

void Aura::takeUsedSpellModifiers ( )

Definition at line 635 of file SpellAura.cpp.

636{
637 if (m_usedModifiers.empty())
638 return;
639
640 for (auto itr = m_usedModifiers.begin(); itr != m_usedModifiers.end();)
641 {
642 auto aurEff = (*itr).first;
643 // Check for faulty entry
644 if (aurEff->getAura() == nullptr || (*itr).second)
645 {
646 itr = m_usedModifiers.erase(itr);
647 continue;
648 }
649
650 aurEff->getAura()->removeCharge();
651 itr = m_usedModifiers.erase(itr);
652 }
653}
Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ update()

void Aura::update ( unsigned long  diff,
bool  skipDurationCheck = false 
)

Definition at line 682 of file SpellAura.cpp.

683{
684 // Do not update trash
685 if (m_isGarbage)
686 return;
687
688 // Do not update aura while updating modifiers
689 if (m_updatingModifiers)
690 return;
691
692 // Check aura effects if aura has been flagged for check
693 if (m_checkAuraEffects)
694 {
695 if (m_auraEffectCount == 0)
696 {
697 // Aura is active but has no effects -> remove aura
698 removeAura();
699 return;
700 }
701
702 m_checkAuraEffects = false;
703 }
704
705 // Periodic auras
706 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
707 {
708 if (m_periodicTimer[i] == 0)
709 continue;
710 if (m_auraEffects[i].getAuraEffectType() == SPELL_AURA_NONE)
711 continue;
712 // Effects with 0 amplitude are not periodic
713 if (m_auraEffects[i].getEffectAmplitude() <= 0)
714 continue;
715
716 m_periodicTimer[i] -= diff;
717 if (m_periodicTimer[i] <= 0)
718 {
719 periodicTick(&m_auraEffects[i]);
720 m_periodicTimer[i] += m_auraEffects[i].getEffectAmplitude();
721 }
722 }
723
724 // Check if aura is about to expire
725 if (m_duration > 0 && !skipDurationCheck)
726 {
727 m_duration -= diff;
728 if (m_duration <= 0)
729 {
730 m_duration = 0;
731 removeAura(AURA_REMOVE_ON_EXPIRE);
732 }
733 }
734}

void periodicTick(AuraEffectModifier *aurEff)

339 m_updatingModifiers = true;
340 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
341 {
342 switch (m_auraEffects[i].getAuraEffectType())
343 {
344 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED:
345 UpdateAuraModDecreaseSpeed(&m_auraEffects[i]);
346 break;
347#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
348#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
349 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_BY_STAT_PCT:
350#endif
351 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_BY_STAT_PCT:
352 m_auraEffects[i].applyEffect(false);
353 m_auraEffects[i].applyEffect(true);
354 break;
355#endif
356 default:
357 break;
358 }
359
360 sLogger.debug("Aura::updateModifiers : Spell Id {}, Aura Effect {} ({}), Target GUID {}, EffectIndex {}, Duration {}, Damage {}, MiscValue {}",

363 m_updatingModifiers = false;
